name: Wizardy Dungeon
description:
----------------------Controls----------------------

WASD - Movement

Space - Dash

Left Mouse Button - Attack

E - Interact

----------------------Controls----------------------

Something has gone wrong in this place Weird Pumpkins inhabit nearly every room. Traverse through and kill everything in sight to reach the end and beat the game. Fight Ice-Cream cones and Noddle's as bosses.

This game has 3 levels and 3 different boss Fights as well as 6 characters that have small differences between them like starting health, gold, move speed etc.
